data.title: Default Early Mid Info Dart From Pallet
data.description: Here's a fast dart lineup you can use to support teammates looking for engagements at Mid, or to mix it up.

data.title: Start Round Info Dart From A Default to Belt
data.description: Here's a great default dart you can use to secure information on Attackers at Belt or Lower.

data.title: Mid Boiler To B Green / Mid Blue Recon Bolt
data.description: This is useful for both scanning players near the B Green Spawn Barrier in Attacker Side Spawn, and players in and around Mid Blue.

data.title: B Hut to B Green Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a good recon bolt to spot enemies heading towards B Site from B Hut.
